recipesJson.name: Mr. Stachio
recipesJson.author: Elvieann
recipesJson.description: Sweet, but very good on its own (by itself I don't add the sweetener).  A work in progress.  I'm aiming for a generic pistachio base for tobacco and dessert flavors.  I've been tasting every few days and even though I liked it after 5 days, a little more time brings out the vanilla).
